Header: U.N. plans talks with Iran, Russia, Turkey on Syria constitutional panel
Content: The United Nations Special Envoy for Syria plans talks with Iran, Russia and Turkey in September to start finalising the composition of the body intended to draft a new Syrian constitution. Staffan de Mistura, attending two-day talks with the three powers in Russia, has received lists from the Bashar al-Assad government and opposition on proposed candidates for the Constitutional Committee.
